alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 4:56PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lowndes and southeastern Brooks Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 456 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Park, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Park, Quitman, Valdosta, I-75 At Exit 16, Remerton, Dasher, Morven, Twin Lakes, Valdosta Regional Airport, Kinderlou, I-75 At Exit 5, Nankin, Empress, Clyattville, Brooks Co A/p, Blue Springs, I-75 At Exit 22 and I-75 At Exit 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
